Sentence.sentence: Well, there might be a lot of us hanging around with lots of free time on our hands.
I could spend months sweating over my own "paintings", but I'd produce something you wouldn't want to hang in your living room.
The stars were people who knew how to get along, who knew how to motivate themselves, usually the kind of people you like to hang out with.
In the case of Facebook, the company says data may hang around until the URL in question is reused, which is usually "after a short period of time", though obviously that time can vary considerably.

"What we find is you actually look at the world slightly differently, because you're looking for things you want to capture, that you may want to hang onto," Dehl explains. "That gets people more engaged in the experience, and they tend to enjoy it more."
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: If you can't get to the nursing home to visit grandma, you can use a telepresence robot to hang out with her.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Rosen says he'll use the last of his savings to try to hang onto the home he worked for more than 20 years to buy.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: They're primarily designed for Low Earth Orbit(LEO) an easily accessible region of space from around 200 to 800 miles above Earth, where human-tended missions like the Hubble Space Telescope and the International Space Station(ISS) hang out.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: What we find is you actually look at the world slightly differently, because you're looking for things you want to capture, that you may want to hang onto, Dehl explains.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"挂，吊"之意。
means: hang ： 通常指一端固定于一点或一条线上，另一端悬于空中的状态。
suspend ： 侧重悬挂物支撑点的灵活性和活动自由。

list.explanation: 表现出勇气，坚持下去，不泄气

example.en: I'm prepared for a rough time, and hang in there.
I'm just hang in. Maybe things will get better.
example.zh: 我会坚持下去。说不定事情会好转。

example.en: The four would not be able to hang the entire juiy up.
example.zh: 那四个人不可能难倒整个陪审团的。

example.en: You have to hang a louie at the "stop" sign.
example.zh: 你必须在那"停"字标牌那儿向左转。

word_mean: gaining 网目悬垂在网结上的增目方法。

Sentence.sentence: But when he finally reached her, the woman flooded him with questions: "Who are you? What antique shop?" However, when she hung up, she regretted the way she had handled the call.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is often the case that anything is possible for those who hang on to hope.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: This photo, with the unique beauty that unfolded before me and that woman who "ruined" it, now hangs on a wall in my bedroom.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Translated into high school terms, this means that if everybody you hang around with is laughing at what John wore or what jane said, then you can bet that wearing or saying something similar will get you the same kind of negative attention.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: While the fear hung over my head, there were also signs that I was headed down the right street.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

hang on sth 有赖于，取决于（某事物）

lj.lj_ly: decided to hang in despite his illness.

To wait for a short period of time.
To spend one's free time in a certain place

lj.lj_ly: “a group of boys who hung out together around what they called ‘Barry's Corner’”(&b{Linda Ellerbee})

lj.lj_ly: spent the evening just hanging out.
hanging out with a former boyfriend.

lj.lj_ly: “We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately”(&b{Benjamin Franklin})

lj.lj_ly: diverse plot lines that did not hang together.
lj.lj_ls: 不同的剧情线索没有形成一体

jx.jx_en_mean: To suspend on a hook or hanger.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 悬吊：在钩子上或衣架上挂起

jx.jx_en_mean: To replace (a telephone receiver) on its base or cradle.

【非正式用语】 抑制，障碍：使引起心理上的困境或抑制

lj.lj_ly: Budget problems hung up the project for months.
lj.lj_ls: 预算问题使得该工程推迟了几个月

lj.lj_ly: The fishing line hung up on a rock.

lj.lj_ly: the success of the Green movement has left that rather uncomfortable question hanging in the air.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal, chiefly US)make a left (or right) turn
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，主美)向左（或右）转弯；左（或右）拐

entry.def: If something hangs in a high place or position, or if you hang it there, it is attached there so it does not touch the ground.

example.ex: Notices painted on sheets hang at every entrance...
example.tran: 写在纸上的告示悬挂在每个入口。

example.ex: A light-bulb hanging from the ceiling filled the room with a cold yellow light...
example.tran: 屋子里天花板上吊着的一个灯泡散发着冷冷的黄光。

entry.def: If a piece of clothing or fabric hangs in a particular way or position, that is how it is worn or arranged.

example.ex: ...a ragged fur coat that hung down to her calves...
example.tran: 她穿的一件长及小腿肚的破旧毛皮大衣

example.ex: Look for a suit made from good, sturdy cloth to ensure it hangs well...
example.tran: 找一套用结实的好布料做的套装，这样的衣服垂感好。

entry.def: If something hangs loose or hangs open, it is partly fixed in position, but is not firmly held, supported, or controlled, often in such a way that it moves freely.

example.ex: ...her long golden hair which hung loose about her shoulders...
example.tran: 她那松散着披在肩上的长长的金发

example.ex: The window sashes were missing, the doors hung open, or were gone altogether...
example.tran: 窗框都不见了，门都敞开着，或者干脆说压根就没有门了。

entry.def: If something such as a wall is hung with pictures or other objects, they are attached to it.

example.ex: The walls were hung with huge modern paintings.
example.tran: 墙上挂着巨幅的现代画。

example.ex: ...a line of wall hooks hung with old anoraks and mud-stained overalls.
example.tran: 挂着旧的短风衣和沾有泥污的工装裤的一排墙钩

entry.def: If someone is hanged or if they hang, they are killed, usually as a punishment, by having a rope tied around their neck and the support taken away from under their feet.

example.ex: The five were expected to be hanged at 7 am on Tuesday...
example.tran: 那5个人将在周二早上7点被施以绞刑。

example.ex: It is right that their murderers should hang...
example.tran: 谋杀他们的凶手就应该被绞死。

entry.def: If something such as someone's breath or smoke hangs in the air, it remains there without appearing to move or change position.

example.ex: His breath was hanging in the air before him...
example.tran: 他的哈气悬浮在自己面前。

example.ex: A haze of expensive perfume hangs around her.
example.tran: 高档香水的气雾弥漫在她周围。

entry.def: If a possibility hangs over you, it worries you and makes your life unpleasant or difficult because you think it might happen.

example.ex: A constant threat of unemployment hangs over thousands of university researchers...
example.tran: 持续存在的失业威胁困扰着数千名大学科研人员。

example.ex: A question mark hangs over many of their futures.
example.tran: 他们的不少期货都还是个问号。

entry.def: Hang is used in expressions such as hang it and hang the money to indicate that you are not concerned about something or the consequences of doing something.
entry.tran: 对…毫不操心;对…满不在乎

example.ex: Once the Americans decide to do a thing, they do it well, and hang the cost.
example.tran: 一旦美国人决定要做一件事，他们就会把它做好，且丝毫不计代价。

entry.def: If you get the hang of something such as a skill or activity, you begin to understand or realize how to do it.
entry.tran: 掌握…的窍门;熟悉…的门道

example.ex: It's a bit tricky at first till you get the hang of it.
example.tran: 刚开始有点儿难，掌握窍门后就好了。

entry.def: If you tell someone to hang in there or to hang on in there, you are encouraging them to keep trying to do something and not to give up even though it might be difficult.

example.ex: Hang in there and you never know what you might achieve.
example.tran: 坚持下去，你永远都无法预料会有什么样的收获。

entry.def: If you let it all hang out, you relax completely and enjoy yourself without worrying about hiding your emotions or behaving politely.

means.word_mean: 1. a special way of doing something;

sentences.sentence: "he had a special knack for getting into trouble"
"he couldn't get the hang of it"
"he adjusted the hang of his coat"

means.word_mean: 3. a gymnastic exercise performed on the rings or horizontal bar or parallel bars when the gymnast's weight is supported by the arms
2. cause to be hanging or suspended;
5. fall or flow in a certain way;

sentences.sentence: "Her long black hair flowed down her back"
"The cloud of suspicion hangs over her"
"The children in the audience attended the recital quietly"
"The child clung to his mother's apron"
"Picasso hangs in this new wing of the museum"

means.word_mean: 11. prevent from reaching a verdict, of a jury
12. decorate or furnish with something suspended;
13. be placed in position as by a hinge;
14. place in position as by a hinge so as to allow free movement in one direction;
15. of meat, in order to get a gamey taste;

sentences.sentence: "hang the venison for a few days"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hangian (intransitive verb), of West Germanic origin, related to Dutch and German hangen, reinforced by the Old Norse transitive verb hanga

sentences.cn: 毕竟, 我不能随便抓一个人强行把他给绞死呀.
sentences.en: After all, I can't just grab a man and hang him by force.

sentences.cn: 我们必须团结在一起, 否者我们将一个个绞死.
sentences.en: We must hang together, or we be hanged separately.

sentences.cn: 在绞死他之前,他们给他戴上了面罩.
sentences.en: They hooded him before hanging him.

sentences.cn: 斯金纳: 他们同样可以用谎言来绞死我. 我不会出卖莫特的.
sentences.en: SKINNER: They can hang me with a lie, too. I'm not going to sell Mulder out.

sentences.cn: 我们必须团结在一起, 否则我们将一个个地被绞死.
sentences.en: We must all hang together, or we shall Be all hanged separately.

sentences.cn: 你可要小心, 要是让谁碰上和看见, 咱就都得一块儿被绞死.
sentences.en: Be careful. If anyone sees you, you'll hang as well as the rest of us.

sentences.cn: 你是怎么从监狱里出来的? 他们为什么不绞死你?
sentences.en: How did you ever get out of jail? Why didn't they hang you?

sentences.cn: 因为我想你们爱丁堡的人民为了泄愤也会把她绞死的.
sentences.en: For I suppose your people of Edinburgh would hang her out of spite.

sentences.cn: 由于你谋杀了那个手无寸铁的妇女, 你将被绞死.
sentences.en: For the murder of that helpless woman, you shall hang by the neck until you dead.

sentences.cn: 降妖伏魔的那个约翰尼·格洛克来啦, 他带着绞架来要把我们通通绞死.
sentences.en: Here's Johnny Gloke, the great gaintkiller, come with a gallows to hang us all!

sentences.cn: 我不想回医院了,哪怕他们把我绞死也罢了!
sentences.en: I won't go back to the hospital if they hang me!

sentences.cn: 在科威特, 一名斯里兰卡人去年被绞死, 或者说当局这样认为.
sentences.en: In Kuwait, a Sri Lankan was executed last year by hanging, or so the authorities thought.

sentences.cn: 说到底, 我总不能抓来一个人强行把他绞死吧?
sentences.en: After all, I can't just grab 5 a man and hang him by force.

sentences.cn: 在那个时候,绞死罪犯是一种大众娱乐.
sentences.en: In those days the hanging of criminals was a public entertainment.

sentences.cn: 谋杀他们的凶手就应该被绞死。
sentences.en: It is right that their murderers should hang.

sentences.cn: 这些房间装饰着挂毯。
sentences.en: The rooms were hung with tapestries.

sentences.cn: 可以用双面胶带或者树胶胶水把剩余没用的卡片粘合并悬挂起来作为节日的装饰.
sentences.en: Glue leftover cards, double sided tape or rubber cement and hang as holiday artwork.

sentences.cn: 挂在手镯或项链上的装饰物.
sentences.en: An ornament that hangs from a bracelet or necklace.

sentences.cn: 你的车子后视镜上会吊中国装饰品.
sentences.en: You have a Chinese knickknack hanging on your rear view mirror.

sentences.cn: 在视线水平以上挂相片或装饰品.
sentences.en: Hang photos and accessories at eye level and up.

sentences.cn: 帷帽在帽沿垂下丝网, 并饰以珠翠装饰.
sentences.en: Curtain hat at the brim hanging wire, and decorated with beads decorated Chui.

sentences.cn: 美国星条旗悬挂在灿烂的天花板上,这是重新装饰的豪华的中心终端车站.
sentences.en: The Stars and Stripes hang under the ceiling constellations in recently refurbished Grand Central Terminal.

sentences.cn: 天花板的装饰错综复杂,穿孔金属板吊灯悬挂在穹顶上.
sentences.en: Ceilings are embellished with intricate coffered domes and perforated metal chandeliers hang in the atrium.

sentences.cn: 教堂什么时候开始为圣诞节装饰?
sentences.en: What time is the hanging of the green at church?

sentences.cn: 用或好似用花彩装饰; 挂花饰于.
sentences.en: To decorate with or as if with festoons; hang festoons on.

sentences.cn: 房里仅有的另一装饰,就是窗上用钩子挂着的肉.
sentences.en: The only other decoration was strips of meat hanging from hooks in the windows.

sentences.cn: 它们的质地如丝绒般柔软, 松松地合拢悬垂着,底边轻微向内卷曲.
sentences.en: They are velvety texture, hanging in loose folds with the ends curling slightly inward.

sentences.cn: 窗户上悬垂着他女朋友送的风铃.
sentences.en: The wind chimes his girl friend gave him as a present are hanging at the window.

sentences.cn: 许多人认为, 俄罗斯的未来要依靠他们.
sentences.en: The future of Russia , many say, hangs on their shoulders.

sentences.cn: 老太太在全家人都死后唯一依靠的支柱就是宗教信仰.
sentences.en: The old lady had only her religion to hang onto when all her family had gone.

sentences.cn: 他已经没有什么东西可以依靠的了.
sentences.en: Nothing was left for him to hang onto.

sentences.cn: 输油管可依靠坚固的钢缆悬挂在水面上.
sentences.en: The pipes may hang over the water from strong steel cable.

sentences.cn: 停留在制衡之链上, 迷宫之心的依靠在冥界与奥林匹斯山之间的平衡上.
sentences.en: On the Great Chains, the Heart of Labyrinth hangs in balance between Hades and Olympus.

sentences.cn: 我们的计划被搁置下来处于悬而未决的状态.
sentences.en: Our plans were left hanging in the balance.

sentences.cn: 事情在脑子里一直悬而未决,对精力是一个极大的消耗.
sentences.en: Having the decision hanging over head is a huge energy drain.

sentences.cn: 银行业还有一些问题悬而未决.
sentences.en: Other question marks still hang over industry.

sentences.cn: 关于窃听我的电话的问题依然悬而未决.
sentences.en: The question about tapping my telephone is still hanging.

sentences.cn: 判决在法官那里仍悬而未决.
sentences.en: Judgment is hanging in the scales of justice.

sentences.cn: 窗帘悬挂的样子表明有人站在后面.
sentences.en: The hang of the curtains showed that somebody was standing behind them.

sentences.cn: 在第四节还剩6分54秒时,麦麦停了下来, 垂下了头,火箭叫了暂停.
sentences.en: With 6:54 left , the Rockets called time out with McGrady motionless, his head hanging.

sentences.cn: 他乐呵呵地说: “ 懂这个诀窍了吧. ”
sentences.en: You'll get the hang of it, he says cheerfully.

sentences.cn: 不要为此灰心丧气, 你会找到诀窍的.
sentences.en: Don't let that get you down. You'll get the hang of it.

sentences.cn: 这些公司生产历史悠久, 生产经验 、 技术及诀窍代代相传.
sentences.en: These company production histories are long, manufacturing experience, technology and hang generation acting according to legend.

sentences.cn: 莉达: 我在练习跆拳道, 我想我已掌握诀窍了.
sentences.en: Rita: I'm practising Tae Kwan Do. I think I'm getting the hang of it now.

sentences.cn: 当事情陷入困境时,诀窍是坚持下去直至好转.
sentences.en: When things get difficult the trick is to hang in until they get better.

Sentence.sentence: The little boy walked out of the school with his head and shoulders hanging down.
This reminds me unpleasantly of Sunnyhill School in Streatham, with its harsh tarmac, where I used to hang about in corners fantasising about wildlife.
However, I can hang around for you if you like.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B
